markdownRemark.html:
I’ve developed a moodboard indicative of the style I want to go towards for my app.

I want my app to be playful and soft, without coming across as childish. I want to use bright colours and a typeface that is easy to read, but has no harsh edges. I liked the scribble style of the image in the bottom right. I may like to use it for some UI elements, especially some of the icon parts.
